Muldrotha: Sultai Graveyard Lands.desc: Headed by [[Muldrotha, The Gravetide]] this deck plays a lot of lands and gets value from the graveyard. [[Tatyova, Benthic Druid]], [[The Gitrog Monster]] both provide lots of value, and cards like [[Null Profusion]] and [[Recycle]] Give lots of card draw.

Tana Tymna: Token Beatdown Soul Sisters.desc: Wreck face by pumping up [[Tana, the Bloodsower]] and beating face with her and a token army. Also has a lot of lifegain shenanigans for the fun of it. Have fun with stuff like [[Ajani, Caller of the Pride]], [[Huatli, Radiant Champion]], [[Rith, the Awakener]] and [[Power Matrix]].

Ghalta: Rawr.desc: Smash into your opponents with [[Ghalta, Primal Hunger]]. Ramp quick into big beaters ([[Aggressive Mammoth]], [[Forgotten Ancient]], [[Ripjaw Raptor]])  to get him out and devastate with a 12/12 trampler. Not exactly difficult to understand.

Alela: Enchantments.desc: Play [[Alela, Artful Provocateur]], then play great enchantments like [[Coastal Piracy]], [[Favorable Winds]], [[Dire Undercurrents]], and [[Mirrormade]] to generate an army of faeries.

Ramos: 5-color retrace.desc: While this jank deck is headed up by [[Ramos, Dragon Engine]], the real commander of the deck is [[Wrenn and Six]]. Find him, Ult him, and have fun retracing a bunch of oddly fun spells. How do you win? I dunno! Copy some stuff, make some tokens, and see what happens! [[Dark Petition]], [[Tamiyo, the Moon Sage]], and [[Ral, Storm Conduit]] might give you a way another out though...

Kenrith: Big Boy Reanimator_template.desc: Do you like playing big creatures but are tired of paying huge mana costs? Well here's a deck for you! Using [[Kenrith, the Returned King]]'s last ability, reanimate massive beaters like [[Gisela, Blade of Goldnight]], [[Aurelia, the Warleader]], [[Etali, Primal Storm]], [[Medomai the Ageless]], [[Xenagos, God of Revels]], and [[The Ur-Dragon]] and deal tons of damage!

Niv-Mizzet, Parun: Big Draw.desc: With [[Niv-Mizzet, Parun]] you'll never run out of cards. Play small things like [[Brainstorm]] and [[Ponder]] for great value, then play [[Wheel of Fortune]], [[Teferi's Puzzle Box]], and [[Time Spiral]] to draw tons of cards and deal tons of damage.

Biogenic Ooze: Ooze Tribal.desc: With the non-legendary [[Biogenic Ooze]] at the help, you make a lot of oozes. Play more oozes with fun effects like [[Experiment One]], [[Mitotic Slime]], and [[Predator Ooze]]. Make big ooze army. Squish with big ooze army.

Kenrith: Group Hug.desc: You're everyone's friend with [[Kenrith, the Returned King]] group hug! All the mana doublers like [[Heartbeat of Spring]], all the card draw in [[Howling Mine]] and [[Minds Aglow]], and... yeah... you can definitely win with this deck, though it might be weird when you win with [[Happily Ever After]], but hey! At least everyone will be happy with you. :)

Kenrith: Ink-Treader.desc: While Kenrith may be at the helm, the real commander of this deck is [[Ink-Treader Nephilim]]. Get him out there along with lots of tokens from [[Silverfur Partisan]] and [[Fungal Infection]], draw a ton of cards with [[Niveous Wisps]], keep reusing your best spells with [[Feather, The Redeemed]], and win the game with [[Fists of Flame]] or [[Fiery Gambit]].
